statement.p: Explain how to find the dimension of W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} -4 \\ -2 \\ 2 \\ -3 \\ 0 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -2 \\ -4 \\ -3 \\ -2 \\ -1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -6 \\ 0 \\ 7 \\ -4 \\ 1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -2 \\ 3 \\ -4 \\ 2 \\ -1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -12 \\ 1 \\ 5 \\ -5 \\ 0 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 8 \\ 5 \\ -13 \\ 9 \\ -2 \end{array}\right]\right\}.
